title: dimension - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: The following JSON schema describes the data format of the dimension object type: Loading A dimension represents a category in a data set and is used for grouping KPIs. The dimension object type has one or more sub-objects, consisting of properties that map it to a KDR field. You can map a dimension to different fields based on the expected value in the KDR field type . In the example below, the dimension Region is mapped to the field region_name for the types record_a and record_b. Example - JSON Representation "dimension": { "Region": { "kdr_record_type_a": "region_name", "kdr_record_type_b": "region_name" }, "Country": { "kdr_record_type_a": "country_name", "kdr_record_type_b": "country_name", } } Break
